General.Name: Pera Gayrimenkul Yatirim Ortakligi AS
General.Description: PERA Gayrimenkul Yatirim Ortakligi AS is a publicly owned real estate investment trust. It invests in the real estate markets of Turkey. PERA Gayrimenkul Yatirim Ortakligi AS is based in Istanbul, Turkey.
General.Address: Gülbahar Mahallesi Büyükdere Caddesi, Istanbul, Turkey
